title: Running 52 marathons 'gives me purpose' after mental health crisis
description: Tommy Greenhouse, 22, who has just completed his 47th run, said the challenge was giving him purpose.
content:
A graduate who struggled with his mental health throughout his studies returned to his university campus to run his 47th marathon out of a planned 52 this year.
Tommy Greenhouse, 22, said the challenge – and his fundraising for 52 charities – had giv... [1118 chars]

title: Playwright Sir Tom Stoppard dies at 88
description: Winning an Oscar for the screenplay for Shakespeare In Love, he captivated the hearts of audiences for more than six decades.
content:
Sir Tom Stoppard, one of the UK’s best-known playwrights, has died aged 88, his agents have announced.
Sir Tom, who won an Oscar and a Golden Globe for the screenplay for Shakespeare In Love, "died peacefully at home in Dorset, surrounded by his fami... [2814 chars]

title: Venezuela calls Trump airspace closure warning 'colonialist threat'
description: US President Donald Trump said the airspace around Venezuela should be considered closed "in its entirety".
content:
Venezuela has accused US President Donald Trump of making a "colonialist threat" after he said the airspace around the country should be considered closed.
The country's foreign ministry called Trump's comments "another extravagant, illegal and unjus... [2585 chars]

title: Springboks lock Eben Etzebeth sent off for eye gouge to mar record win over Wales
description: The veteran second row was shown a straight red card after his thumb made contact with the eye of Alex Mann
content:
South Africa lock Eben Etzebeth was sent off for an eye gouge as the veteran’s ugly act marred a record Springboks win against Wales in Cardiff.
A 73-0 defeat was the hosts’ heaviest in history on home soil, with the world champions in impressive for... [1177 chars]

title: Gianluigi Donnarumma adds to shaky Man City concerns in Leeds win
description: Gianluigi Donnarumma has kept Manchester City solid in a number of games but he set the tone for the team's second-half collapse
content:
